name: Sheet Pan Veggie Dinner with Broccoli, Sweet Potato, Tofu, Chickpeas & Miso Maple Dressing
description: Sheet Pan Veggie Dinner with Broccoli, Sweet Potato, Tofu, Chickpeas, Sunflower seeds dressed with Miso Maple Dressing. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Recipe. Can be soyfree with chickpea miso. 23 gm of Protein!

video.name: SHEET PAN VEGGIE DINNER WITH MISO MAPLE DRESSING | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Sheet Pan Veggie Dinner with Broccoli, Sweet Potato, Tofu, Chickpeas, Sunflower seeds dressed with Miso Maple Dressing. 
ðŸ’™ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/06/sheet-pan-veggie-dinner-miso-maple-dressing.html
ðŸ’™ MY BOOKS: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

Roasted Veggie Pan dinners are quick to put together and allow for flavor experimentation!. Toss in spices or herbs, spread on pan, bake and done. Add dressing of choice and serve as is or over greens or with cooked grains. Todayâ€™s veggies have chipotle pepper powder and flakes to add flavor and are served with a miso maple dressing. The sweet and sour dressing mellows the heat of the chipotle.  
You can also serve the veggies with vegan sour cream or lime crema. Veggies + sunflower seeds + dressing, refreshing, filling and Delicious. Broccoli, Tofu and chickpeas amp up the protein to about 20 g per serve!

Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Recipe. Can be soyfree with chickpea miso. 20 gm of Protein
More Bowl Meals: https://www.veganricha.com/?s=bowl

https://www.youtube.com/joakimkarud

recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas ( or 1 15 oz can drained)
1 cup tofu ((pressed for 10 mins then cubed))
1/2  red or green bell pepper (, sliced)
1/2 tsp chipotle pepper flakes or red pepper flakes
additional optional spices: dash of black pepper (cinnamon, 1/2 tsp oregano)
a good pinch of salt and paprika/chipotle pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 C). Line a large baking dish with parchment. Slice/cube the veggies and tofu and add to bowl or directly to the baking dish. Add chickpeas or beans that you are using. Drizzle oil all over and toss.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 C). Line a large baking dish with parchment. Slice/cube the veggies and tofu and add to bowl or directly to the baking dish. Add chickpeas or beans that you are using. Drizzle oil all over and toss.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the spices and salt in a small bowl. Add the spice mix and toss to coat. Spread the veggies in the baking dish in one layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the spices and salt in a small bowl. Add the spice mix and toss to coat. Spread the veggies in the baking dish in one layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400 degrees F for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400 degrees F for 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the sunflower seeds and garlic, spray oil on top of the garlic and seeds and bake for another 10 to 15 minutes until the veggies are done to preference and chickpeas are roasted.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the sunflower seeds and garlic, spray oil on top of the garlic and seeds and bake for another 10 to 15 minutes until the veggies are done to preference and chickpeas are roasted.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with drizzle of the miso maple dressing and some crunchy lettuce or greens if you wish or add to tacos with the dressing and avocado.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with drizzle of the miso maple dressing and some crunchy lettuce or greens if you wish or add to tacos with the dressing and avocado.

recipeInstructions.text: Dressing: Mix miso in lime + water until well combined. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix. (you can also use a small blender to mix the dressing). Taste and adjust flavor to preference with additional lime for tang or salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Dressing: Mix miso in lime + water until well combined. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix. (you can also use a small blender to mix the dressing). Taste and adjust flavor to preference with additional lime for tang or salt.

keywords: miso maple dressing, sheet pan veggie dinners, vegan sheet pan dinner
